reviewText: I'm a busy Mom and I rarely have time to stretch! Trudy Haas made the Yoga easy to do, fast, and very relaxing. I love to watch this video in the middle of the day for a little relaxation and "mom time".

Finally, a yoga/fitness tape I actually WANT to do!  Trudy Haas has a calming, relaxing 20 minute yoga segment that can be done by people of any age.  I love the ease of the stretching and feel totally energized after I do it~Both 20 minute segments are excellent and you won't have to go out and buy equipment. I would highly recommend this DVD as a "keeper".

excellent - the yoga instructor is fabulous - clear, consise instruction -the entire set can be done with your eyes closed!  Excellent choice of set - very calming and works for a beginner or an advanced student
